channel.title: Gella Kúria on Mansion Gella
channel.description: Recent content in Gella Kúria on Mansion Gella

item.title: House Rules
item.description: In the area of the accomodation, smoking is strictly prohibited! Smoking is only allowed at the assigned places, outside of the area. Evidence of violation of our smoke free principle will result in a surcharge. Protect yout health and invironment: quit smoking! This accomodation is unfortunately unable to allow pets at this moment. We hope you find a solution for them and thus, neither You, or your small friend will be sad during these couple of days.
